Property.Name: BackgroundColor
Property.ShortDesc: Indicates the background color of the **Dialog** panel.
Property.LongDesc:
The background color of the **Dialog** panel.
It include the border and all the child "drawing area".
Can be set to **null** for transparency.

Property.Name: ForegroundColor
Property.ShortDesc: Indicates the foreground color of the **Dialog** panel.
Property.LongDesc:
Indicates the foreground (text) color of the **Dialog** panel.
It include the border and all the child "drawing area".

Property.Name: Border
Property.LongDesc:
Indicates the outline border style.
See Border Style for more infos

Property.Name: Shadow
Property.LongDesc:
Indicates the panel shadow style.
